sentences.en: can be, if I forebode aright, no power, short of the Divine mercy, to disclose, whether by uttered words, or by type or emblem, the secrets that may be buried with a human heart.
sentences.cn: 如果我的预感不错的话，除去上天的仁慈，没有什么力量，无论是通过讲出来的语言或是任何形式的标志，能够揭示可能埋在一个人心里的秘密。

sentences.en: It is very difficult to forebode all the time.
The dark clouds forebode a rainstorm.
sentences.cn: 乌云预示着暴风雨即将来临.

sentences.en: These black clouds forebode a violent storm.
sentences.cn: 这些乌云预示着狂风暴雨即将到来.
这些情况预示著要有灾祸.

trans.tran_cn: 预示, 预言, 预兆, 预感
trans.tran_en: to warn of or indicate (an event, result, etc) in advance
